sections.name: Complete these skills whenever you want

steps.task: 70 Construction - Teak Logs from Kingdom. Use Butler in POH for planks. Mahogany homes until 70. 400-600 Oak Planks → 50, 2,300 Teak Planks 50-70 (This should cost you about 2.5m gp)

70 Farming - Should be completed passively.
70 Hunter - Should be completed passively with BHRs.

Train on Sulpha Naguas until 60 Attack (If you ever want to AFK, the Naguas are vastly superior to most things as you also passively get RuneCrafting while crazy combat experience. Karambwans and Naguas should be your go to AFKs before Gem Crab/Shooting stars. It is advised to complete Perilous Moons before AFKing Naguas as you will get crazy rates with Dual Macahuitl's and Bloodmoon.

Collect Easy CA's from [Ghommal](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Ghommal). Lamp on herblore. Get a Dragon Defender at Warriors Guild, training on Defensive
OPTIONAL: Rum Deal requires 47 Prayer (Boostable), you may have enough ensouled heads from 58 slayer to get this level

Start A Great Brain Robbery & plant Watermelons in the patch on Harmony Island
Complete Fire Cape if you're confident Meleeing after Defender

OPTIONAL: Medium Combat Achievements before Barrows are fairly difficult to achieve at this point but possible, especially with friends to help with TOB entry mode. If you're planning to complete Medium Combat Achievements before Barrows the below CA's are all possible and recommended on the first KC run. Buy Dragon Halberd to safespot Bats & Healers.
Fight Caves Veteran
Facing Jad Head-on

Teleport to Kourend. Enter Catacombs. Head West & climb the Vine for Giants Pit
Complete Obor Combat Achievements - You need 1 key to do all of the CA's aside from the 5 KC task. You can farm 5 keys here.
Complete Bryophyta Combat Achievements - You need 1 key to do all of the CA's aside from the 5 KC task. You can farm 5 keys here.

Complete What Lies Below (You may need to get a Chaos Talisman from Leeches in Alternate Abyss; ALR)
Start Defender of Varrock until you unlock Armoured Zombies

OPTIONAL: If you are not & want 70 Magic to burst Zombies and are confident going to DKS in Rune Armour, you can Iban Blast Rex for Berserker ring and some magic levels. Otherwise we do this after Barrows Gear. You can also alch at Rex waiting for them to spawn.

Armoured Zombies drop the Zombie Axe which is an excellent mid tier weapon (used until Abyssal Whip). It is advised to hunt for this now using Ice Burst (If 70 magic). The best way is buying Ice Sacks from LMS and using them in a PvP World. (IMPORTANT: ONCE YOU GET TO THE CAVE WITH THE ZOMBIES DO NOT CONTINUE THE QUEST BY LOOKING OVER THE LEDGES). Alternatively you can buy the runes.
ANOTHER WARNING: DO NOT LOOK OVER THE LEDGES OR THE INSTANCE IS OVER AND YOU CAN GET BAGGED UP BY PKERS
IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO SCOUT THE LADDER WITH AN ALT TO MAKE SURE YOU DON'T GET BAGGED UP IF DOING PVP WORLD METHOD.
Also remember to change off PvP world if you bank but you can stay on 1 trip for 1,000+ KC (over drop rate)
Don't cast on Defensive. If you can get 78 Magic before Barrows you can build a Barrows Portal with a +5 red stew boost.

Another option is to complete Barrows before this and use the Runes from Barrows to burst the axe, but you may not have a barrows portal for Barrows which is slightly inefficient. The portal is not mandatory if you are not close. We only do a small bit of barrows.
If you do the above, repair the axe
Complete Knight Waves (flinch with Zombie Axe)
IF 78+ Magic
Boost with a Red Evil Dave stew to 83 Magic to make a Barrows Portal
OPTIONAL: Medium CAs before Barrows (Do this anyway you want or can but the CAs I did are below)
All Bryophyta
All Obor
All Wintertodt
All Tempoross (except Angler outfit)
ALL Scurrius
Barrows; (All but 10/25 KC tasks)
Deranged Archaeologist; (Magic only & dodging books) [GENUINELY BE CAREFUL ON THIS ONE. HE CAN HIT HARD]
Giant Mole; (No damage kill)
Hespori; (Hesporisn't, Weed Whacker, Plant-Based Diet)
Hueycoatl; (10kc, earth spells, Pillar Lover, Speed Trialist, Perfect Huey) [Can do on Mass world]
Jad Challenges; (Second Challenge + only melee) [This one is challenging so attempt for fun or skip]

Chambers of Xeric: (No Falling Rocks Guardians, Long Range safespot a Shaman, Ice demon with no prayer, damage & fire spells, Tightrope Skip) [Scout the first room. 2x Phoenix Necklace & tick perfect for Rope skip(also maybe a skip as challenging)
Entry TOB has some easy CAs otherwise the above is what I did. Medium before barrows IS NOT MANDATORY BUT IS COZY.

We are now going to do some Barrows. There are many ways to get there so choose which you want or unlock it before starting. We are only after tank gear so probably don't need to do much more than 100 chests. Use Wind Wave. Morytania hard for more runes is locked behind 70 prayer so not worth doing at this stage. Kill 2 skeletons 1 bloodworm every run to maintain blood runes.
78 Magic → Boost to 83 and make a Barrows portal in POH
Salve Graveyard portal (Home teleport, recharge prayer on altar/pool, take salve graveyard portal→BKR fairy ring→Boat to barrows)
^ Making Agility Potions to jump the wall is optional
Complete barrows until you have Tank helm, Plate, Legs
Dump all your herblore experience. If 70 achieved, skip to completing Song of the Elves then return to this step
Make Super Strengths & equal amount of Super Attack
Use Harralanders, Avantoe & Irits in Mastering Mixology (Don't grind them all incase the ratios aren't correct. 10k+ is good then top up)
Complete the Grapple Diary steps and use all lamps on Herblore
You may need to obtain a Runite Bar
Runite Bar - If crystal key open Crystal Chest in Taverley. If not/no luck, trade Rune Legs in at the Nest in Aldarin for guaranteed Runite Bar
Complete Song of the Elves
Make 10+ Phoenix Necklaces
Seren Video guide - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XRZVxU-umX8
Camp Perilous Moons until Eclipse & Blood (Green logging optional) [I don't recommend Birdhouse runs/Farm contracts while there]
(Step unders are very recommended until they start hitting 16s)
I recommend killing all 3 until 70 prayer is banked, then you can do 1kc runs if only 1 outstanding set
Zombie Axe Eclipse on Slash (Step under every hit)
Zombie Axe Blue Moon on Crush (Use the Boppers if you get them, step under every hit)
Zombie Axe Blood Moon on Slash (Use DDS specials for this one. Steps under only when you see the blood leave your character)
WHEN 60 PRAYER BANKED GET CHIVALRY WITH VARLAMORE PRAYER METHOD (Wave 1 colloseum for Sunfire Splinters)
IF 70 PRAYER BANKED GET PIETY WITH VARLAMORE PRAYER METHOD
While doing Perilous Moons you should hopefully bank and finish off 70 herblore if not already
Perilous Moons Loot:
Supercompost: Mine 2:1 Volcanic Ash:Compost and turn them into Ultra Compost
Dump all banked prayer experience
Water orbs: Make Battlestaffs & alch (You can alch the staffs while doing the next hunter staff and repeat the process)
Maple & Yew Seeds: FARM BROTHER

sections.name: Bank 177
sections.withdraw: Teleport Runes, Death Rune, Axe, Defence Potion (3)/(4), Volcanic Sulphur, Molten Glass, Dark Essence Block, Kharedst's Memoirs, Games Necklace, Pickaxe (13 Inventory Slots) + Combat Gear & Food

steps.task: Teleport to Kourend Castle
Complete Kingdom Divided

sections.name: Bank 178
sections.withdraw: Teleport Crystal, Ardy Cloak, Dramen Staff, Pickaxe, Coins, Axe, Knife, Teasing Stick, 3 Fox fur, Tick Manipulation & 5 box traps (19 Inventory Slots)

steps.task: Teleport to Priffdinas
Head East & Mine an Adamantite Ore [Western Province Hard Diary]
Head north and catch around 5,000 Red Chinchompas
Ardy Cloak → AJP
Head East towards the Sunlight Antelopes
Catch 3x Sunlight Antelopes (Keep the fur)
Ardy Cloak → AJP
Head to Hunter Guild
Talk to [Pellem](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Pellem) and make Mixed Hide Top, Bottom & Boots
Bank at Hunter Guild

sections.name: Bank 179
sections.withdraw: Coins, Butterfly net/Magic Net

steps.task: Buy 27 Butterfly Jars from Imia North-East
Talk to Guildmaster Apatura (2,1) [At First Light]
Continue At First Light until needing to go to Guild Hunter Fox
Go down the stairs and catch Moonlight Moths to the South
Moonlight Moths restore 22 prayer per inventory slot and you can catch over 400/hour so these are excellent prayer
Use Dashing Kebbit meat on Moonlight Moths to double the restore to 44 per inventory slot (You can optional hunt more if you want)
Throw the Chinchompas to get 75+ Range
Kill Royal Titans until both Prayer Scrolls
Use all 3 Perilous Moons Sets
These are 0 damage if you use Water/Fire Wave on the Elementals and kill both giants roughly at the same time so very safe on HCIM
This is now a comfortable point to get your Enhanced Weapon Seed from Corrupted Gauntlet with Tier 3 Preparation.

There are 2 paths you can take beyond Corrupted Gauntlet, and they will both lead to raiding. One of them is the Blade of Saeldar Route & the other Noxious Halberd Rush. I would only recommend the Blade Route if you enjoy Corrupted Gauntlet, but the Noxious Halberd Route may require alts to effectively do and may be a bit more boring but both are routed below and are very similar. (I did the Blade route so the Halberd Route is theorycrafted rather than tested. The guide will mention when you detour BUT if you are doing Blade Route, DO NOT make a Blade before the BOFA. You will be staying until 2x Enhanced Weapon Seeds.
Head to Fossil Island
Withdraw a Chisel & Uncut gems from Gauntlet.
Cut these Underwater while farming Seaweed Spores & Seaweed from the patches
Fletch Arrowshafts from Maple Logs 45-52 Fletching in similar style
Depending how spooned your Enhanced(s) were depends on how much outstanding Mining we will need to do later for crafting as we will want an Amulet of Glory fairly soon (75+5 boost/80)
Teleport to Miscellania and collect your resources (check allocation before to make sure they are atleast on x10 teaks)

sections.name: Bank 181
sections.withdraw: Ardougne Cloak, Dramen Staff, Coins

steps.task: Ardy Cloak → AIS
Head North and bank, withdrawing 27 Teak Logs
Turn 27 Teak Logs into Planks at the Sawmill North-West. You will need roughly 8,000 Teak Planks for 83 Construction Banked
Buy 1x Bolt of Cloth
Minigame teleport to Blast Furnace
Depending on Coal/Iron in the bank, buy 300 coal+Iron & make 300 Steel Bars at the Blast Furnace

sections.name: Bank 182
sections.withdraw: Coins, Teleport Runes to House, Falador, Varrock, Ardougne, Nature Runes, Noted Rune from Corrupted Gauntlet, 4x Steel Bars, Plank Sack, Inventory of Teak Planks

steps.task: Alch your Rune & Dragon Items from Corrupted Gauntlet while training construction via Mahogany Homes until 83 Construction

sections.name: Bank 183
sections.withdraw: Coins, Teleport Runes, Camulet, Ardougne Cloak, Dramen Staff,

steps.task: Minigame Teleport to Blast Furnace
Head West & buy 11x Gold Leaves, 10x Marble Blocks, 15x Limestone Bricks, 1x Magic Stone
Teleport to Yanille
Buy 6,000 Soul Runes
Teleport to Falador
Make 3x Duelling Rings (8), 3x Games Necklace (8)
Ardy Cloak → CIS
Talk to [Tyss](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Tyss) for Arceuss Signet
Ardy Cloak → Zanaris
Buy a Fairy Enchantment from Fairy Fixit
Camulet
Talk to Eblis for an Ancient Signet
Bank anywhere

sections.name: Bank 184
sections.withdraw: Bow of Faerdhinen & Crystal Armour, Teleport Runes, Tinderbox, Coins, Guam Leaf, Marrentil, Pestle & Mortar, Hammer, Costume Needle, Axe, Pickaxe, Spade, Sapphire Lantern (16 Inventory Spaces)

steps.task: Ardy Cloak → CIP
Take boat to Relleka
Talk to Brundt [Lunar Diplomacy]
Complete Lunar Diplomacy
Wield Seal of Passage
Bank at Lunar Bank (DO NOT DEPOSIT ALL ARMOUR SETS)

sections.name: Bank 185
sections.withdraw: Bow of Faerdhinen & Crystal Armour, Seal of Passage, 3 lots of 7 random cooked food

steps.task: Complete Dream Mentor. (Bosses are a breeze with Bow of Fardhinen. Safespot the 2nd & 3rd by the book)
Trade Baba Yaga & buy Lunar Signet & 11,000 Astrals Runes

sections.name: Bank 186
sections.withdraw: 5x Mithril Bars, Tinderbox & 1x Yew Log

steps.task: Teleport to Emir's Arena
Head South to Shantay Pass
Take Carpet to Polnivneach
Once off, wait for your character to drink a waterskin then cast Humidify [Desert Hard Diary]
Complete a lap of Pollnivneach Agility Course [Desert Hard Diary]
Take Carpet to Sophanem
Talk to High Priest [1,4] [Contact!]
Continue Contact until you pick up the Keris
Return to the maze & kill the ranger Locus Rider nearby [Desert Hard Diary]
Complete Contact!
Head to Nardah
Light a fire on the Mayor's Balcony [Desert Hard Diary]
Smith a Mithril Platebody [Desert Hard Diary]
Bank at Nardah

sections.name: Bank 187
sections.withdraw: Blackjack, Noted Food, Coins, Rogues Outfit

steps.task: Head to Pollnivneach and train thieving until 71 (Blackjack Bandits until 65 then Menaphites to 71)
Take Carpet to Sophanem
Bank at Contact! bank

sections.name: Bank 188
sections.withdraw: Food, Lockpick, Cure Me Spells

steps.task: Go to Pyramid Plunder & Loot all Gold Chests until Room 6, and all Sarcophagus' during & after Room 4 (6 Gold Chests, 3 Sacrophagus')
Repeat until you find a Pharaoh's Sceptre (Roughly 4 hours)
Use all Sceptre Charges so it is empty
If you spoon it, finish 72 Thieving off at either Menaphites or Pyramid Plunder (Looting Room 5 & 6 fully)

sections.name: Bank 189
sections.withdraw: Coins, Teleport Runes, Hammer, Crystal Saw, 2x Mahogany planks, 3x Gold Leaf, 8x Marble Block, Bolt of Cloth, Steel Bar, 3x Duelling Ring (8), 3x Games Necklace (8)

steps.task: Home Teleport to Lunar Isle
Swift back to Regular Spellbook
Teleport to Player Owned House
Use the building mode to move all the rooms away
Build a Superior Garden immediately North of the portal. (rotate for the pool to be close to portal)
Build an Achievement Gallery West of the portal. (rotate for the jewellery box to be close to portal)
Build/Move a Study East of the Portal
Build a Portal Nexus West of the Superior Garden
Build a Marble Portal Nexus. Upgrade it to Gilded Portal Nexus
It is your choice what teleports to put in this. I personally had Kourend Castle & Lunar Isle as musts, and the rest were the standard spellbook teleports. Kharyl for Morytania Diary
Build a Mahogany EAGLE Lecturn in the Study
Build a Basic Jewellery Box in the Achievement Gallery
Bank at Castle Wars via your Jewellery box and withdraw: 10x Limestone Bricks, Magic Stone, 5000 Blood & Soul Runes, Arceuss Signet
Build a Dark Altar in the Achievement Gallery

sections.name: Bank 190
sections.withdraw: Wily Cat, Stews, Pharaoh's Sceptre, Ancient Signet, Lunar Signet, 10000 Astral Runes, Hammer, Crystal saw

steps.task: Catch Rats and use Orange Spice to Boost Construction
If you get a +2 boost (85+), you can bank and make the Fairy Ring in the POH as you will have time
When you get a +5 boost (88), pick up your cat and teleport to POH and make the Occult Altar in the Achievement Gallery

sections.name: Bank 191
sections.withdraw: Dramen Staff, Teleport Runes, Coins, Brimhaven Vouchers

steps.task: Teleport to POH → AJP
Head to Mastering Mixology and dump a good portion of your herbs here.

Use Harralanders, Avantoe(some Kwuarm) & Irits in Mastering Mixology (Don't grind them all incase the ratios aren't correct. 10k+ is good then top up). Don't use all your Kwuarms as you will need them
Buy the goggles/Amulet if you haven't already.
Teleport to Ardougne
Take the boat to Brimhaven
Buy Amylase packs from Pirate Jackie the Fruit
Boost if needed and make 10 Stamina Potions (4), 10 Super Restores (4), 10 Prayer Potions (4)
Bank all

sections.name: Bank 192
sections.withdraw: 10x Prayer Potions (4), 10x Super Restores (4) & 2x Marble Blocks

steps.task: Teleport to POH
Make a Restoration Pool then upgrade it to a Revitalisation Pool
Teleport to Castle Wars via Jewellry Box
Teleport to POH
Upgrade your pool to a Fancy Rejuvination Pool. (You need 82 Herblore so it will take a while)
Teleport to Castle Wars via Jewellry Box
Bank All

sections.name: Turael Skipping Method
sections.withdraw: Dramen Staff, Combat Gear (Blood Moon with Dual Macahuitl's or Zombie Axe with Defender), Slayer Helm (i), Food (Karambwans and Ice Fiends), Expeditious Bracelets, Super Strength Potion (not divine), Stamina Potion, Antipoison, Rune Pouch (NPC Contact Runes)

steps.task: Block these tasks asap: Dogs (DLQ), Lizards (CIR), Wolves (Stronghold of Security), Kalphites (Task-Only Kalphite Lair), Banshees (CKS)

You will be NPC contacting Turael and completing 49 Turael Tasks and then 50th at Konar or Duradel (up to you). You then repeat this process to 100 tasks, 150, 200 and 250 and so on to stack slayer points while working on 69 Slayer. The methods and locations for each monster are above
Order of points usage: Bigger & Badder, Blocking Tasks, Slayer Helmet, Ring Bling, Broad Arrows
If you can buy all of the above through boosting before 69 Slayer then stack as many points as possible doing the same method until 69

sections.name: Bank 198
sections.withdraw: Bow of Faerdhinen, Crystal Armour & combat gear.

steps.task: Complete Monkey Madness 2 (Glough is easy with Bow of Faerdhinen but I would still advise the safe spots)
Complete Path of Glouphrie (easy)
Continue & Complete Defender of Varrock (easy)

Complete While Guthix Sleeps (If you're worried about Praying the Assassins at the start of the Quest wrong, camp prayer melee (or click prayer melee when the 0 hitsplat from range appears). During the Elemental Boss Fight focus your prayers before gear as he attacks faster and hits harder towards the end of the fight. The Tormented Demons are easy
Buy an Isafdor Painting from Ser Renitee
Complete In Aid of Myreque (All the items should be in the bank except for the mackeral/axes &/or snails & maybe the bars if you used them all)
Complete a Hard Temple Trek [Morytania Hard Diary]

sections.name: Bank 200
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear (Bow of Faerdhinen), Pickaxe, Dramen Staff, Teleport Runes, Slayer Helmet, Spade, Ectophial, Silver Bar, Pot, Restore Potion (3), Garlic, Elf Teleport Crystal

steps.task: Teleport to POH → BIP
Enter the Nature Grotto & pray piety on the Altar [Morytania Hard Diary]
Head to the Haunted Mine
Mine a Mithril Deposit [Morytania Hard Diary]
Teleport to POH → Kharyl Portal [Morytania Hard Diary]
Head to the Slayer Tower and climb both of the Spike climbs [Morytania Hard Diary]
Ectophial
Crush the Silver Bar
Use the Garlic on the Restore Potion, then the crushed Silver to make a Guthix Balanace [Morytania Medium Diary]
Enter Port Phasmatys
Take boat to Mos Le'Harmless
Talk to Brother Tranquility to travel to Harmony Island
Harvest Watermelons
Teleport POH → CKS
Talk to Le Sabre and complete Morytania Medium & Hard Diary
Teleport to Lletya
Kill an elf with a crystal bow using your Bow of Faerdhinen [Western Province Hard Diary]
Check Health on Palm Tree [Western Province Hard Diary]
Teleport POH → DLQ
Kill a Dust Devil wearing the Slayer Helmet [Desert Hard Diary]
Bank at Shantay Pass

sections.name: Bank 201
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear to kill Kalphite Queen, 2x Ropes, Antipoison, Thralls, etc

steps.task: Head West to Kalphite Lair
Use Rope to Enter and peak at the end for a free world

You only need to kill 1 Kalphite Queen for Diary completion. I would advise standing beneath her every time you need to heal. This may take 2 trips as she can hit pretty hard but should be 1 and done.
Complete Desert Hard Diary at Jarr (Lamp on Herblore)
You can now turn all herbs into unfinished potions which is always worth the cost.

sections.name: Bank 202
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear, Coins, Teleport Runes, 1 Astral Rune, 1 Mind Rune, 1 Cosmic Rune, Sapphire Lantern, Dramen Staff, Adamantite Ore, 6x Coal, Book of the dead, Pickaxe, Seed Dibber, Lockpick, Rada's Blessing (2), House Teleport (22 Inventory Slots)

steps.task: Teleport to POH
Change Spellbook to Lunars on Occult Altar
Teleport to Kourend Woodland
Take the Minecart to Mount Quidamortem
Cast Monster Examine on a Troll [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Lovakenj with Book of the Dead
Mine a Lovakite Ore [Kourend Hard Diary]
Run to the Forgotten Tower
Smelt an Adamant Bar [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Piscarillius with Book of the Dead
Deliver an Artefact to Captain Khaled [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Hosidius with Book of the Dead
Plant a Logavano Seed at the Tithe Farm [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Hosidius again
Enter the Woodcut Guild [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Shayzien
Head South
Kill a Zombie in the Shayzien Crypts [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Shayzien
Head North then East
Kill Soldiers from (Tier 1) → (Tier 5). Drop the obsolete sets when upgraded
House Tab to POH
Change back to Regular Spellbook
Fairy ring → DJR
Bank at Shayzien Chest

sections.name: Bank 203
sections.withdraw: Bow of Fardhinen, Full Crystal, Shayzien Armour 5 (all pieces), Teleport Runes, Antipoison, few food & potions, Dramen Staff

steps.task: Head North and kill a Lizardmen until you get a Xerics Talisman Drop. Take all Fangs. Wear the Crystal
Head West and kill 1 Lizardman Shaman (Wear the Shayzien armour. You can just stand still by a wall if you want you only need 1 kill) [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to POH → CIR
Head to Mount Karuulm
Buy Brimstone boots and kill 1 Wyrm [Kourend Hard Diary]
Teleport to Xerics Heart on Xerics Talisman [Kourend Hard Diary]
Talk to Tyss to complete Kourend Hard Diary (Lamp on Herblore)
Now we have the Bone Crusher, Ash Sanctifier & Soul Bearer we can begin the slayer grind towards Raids. This is where we can detour towards the Noxious Halberd if you did not get the Blade of Saeldor

Similar to before we are going to be Turael skipping but now that we have hopefully bought everything, slayer points are no longer needed & instead of doing a task every 50th, we can do a task every time we get assigned a good one.
Use the occult altar in your POH to easily swap between Lunars, Arceus & Ancient Spellbook
NPC Contact Duradel for a task. The only tasks you are looking for are:
Ankou (Barrage in Catacombs, no alt needed)
Bloodvelds (Barrage with Alts in Catacombs or Saeldor them. Extend if barraging)
Dagannoths (Barrage with Alts in Catacombats or Saeldor them)
Black Demons (Demonic Gorillas with Saeldor & Bow of Faerdhinen (Arclight/Zombie Axe if no Blade))
Greater Demons (Tormented Demons with Dark Demonbane (Ahrim Staff or Blue Moon staff) and Arclight))
Dust Devils (Ice Barrage in Catacombs. Extend ASAP)
Nechryaeel (Ice Barrage in Catacombs. Extend Asap)

If Duradel doesn't offer any of these tasks, NPC Contact Aya and replace your task streak with a new assignment. You should be in your Turael slayer gear from earlier in the guide until you pull an above task, then change to the gear accordingly

Drops wise we are ideally after 4 Zenyte Shards & 3 Tormented Synapses. On drop rate and including all other tasks, we will probably see 87 Slayer at this point. Continue to 92 if you are rushing Noxious Halberd. Once you have all 4 Zenytes & 3 Tormented Synapses we can leave slayer for a while.
Zenyte Order: Anguish → Suffering → Tormented Bracelet → Torture Amulet
Tormented Synapse Order: Purging Staff → Scorching Bow → Emberlight (Revert the Purging Staff to Scorching Bow when your Arclight has 0 charges)

You will need 74 Fletching for Scorching Bow. If you bought Broader Fletching you can make Broad Arrows until 74 which are very fast. Cut Maple Logs while farming Seaweed Spores and then make them Headless + Broad while doing Fishing Trawler for Angler Outfit (Tempoross Combat Achievement).
If you obtain 87 Slayer, the trident is optional depending if you plan to kill Doom of Mokhaiotl for Eye of Ayak (very dangerous for HCIM for accessable)
If you skipped Blade of Saeldor you can get Kraken Whip which is decent before Nox Hally.

sections.name: Bank 204
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear (Blood Moon with Dual Macahuitl's are best), Coins, Teleport Runes, Dramen Staff, Costume Needle, Hammer, 2x Box Traps, Potions & Food

steps.task: Teleport to Civitas Illa Fortis
Head to the building North-East of the Quetzals
Inspect Empty Display Case (1) [Ethically Acquired Antiques]
Continue Ethically Acquired Antiques until repairing the Sail
Head South and talk to [Emelio](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Emelio) (1) [Meat and Greet]
Head back to the Trader Crewmember
Continue Ethically Acquired Antiques until shaming Haig Halen [Ethically Acquired Antiques]
Teleport to Civitas Illa Fortis
Head South & talk to Spice Merchant (2) [Meat and Greet]
Open the box code 2546
AJP Fairy Ring
Head South-West & talk to Guildmaster Fox[At First Light]
Continue At First Light until you need to head to Atza
Head North-West to [Ortus Farm](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Ortus_Farm)
Talk to Alba [Meat and Greet]
Continue Meat and Greet until you need to return to Emilio
Teleport to Civitis Illa Fortis
Head to the building North-East of the Quetzals
Talk to Curator Herminius to complete Ethically Acquired Antiques (4)
Head South-East back to Emelio
Continue & Complete Meat and Greet
Head West
Talk to [Atza](https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/Atza) [At First Light]
Continue At First Light until needing to go to Guildmaster Fox
AJP Fairy Ring
Continue & Complete At First Light
Teleport to Civitas Illa Fortis
Take the Quetzal to Quetzacalli Gorge
Continue & Complete The Heart of Darkness
Make sure to unlock the statue teleport while there
Talk to Servius (1) [The Final Dawn]
Take the Quetzal to Quetzacalli Gorge
Bank all

sections.name: Bank 205
sections.withdraw: Blood Moon & Dual Macahuitl's, combat potions & food

steps.task: Kill Frost Nagua's until you get Pendant of ates (OPTIONAL: Glacial Temotli's)
Recommended: Kill Amoxiatl instead for the combat achievements; You may get it here passively. The 30 second one you may want to return for
Once you get it, continue The Final Dawn until needing after killing the Emissary
Teleport to Civitas Illa Fortis
Kill a guard & pick up the bones
Continue The Final Dawn until needing to talk to Servius
Bank at Cam Torum

sections.name: Bank 206
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear, Food & Potions

steps.task: Talk to Servius [The Final Dawn]
Continue The Final Dawn until you talk to Attala after killing Lucius & Chimalli
Teleport to Civitas Illa Fortis
Take the Quetzal to Tal Teklan
Talk to Servius [The Final Dawn]
Bank North

sections.name: Bank 207
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear (Melee & Range), Food & Potions, Teleport Runes

steps.task: Take North Quetzal to Teklan
Continue the Final Dawn until you unlock the Shortcut
Take the shortcut to the surface
Run East & activate statue
Run West & restock food & potions at the bank
Return to the shortcut & descend
Continue & Complete The Final Dawn

This unlocks Doom of Mokhaiotl which is accessible after you obtain all 3 Demonbane weapons down the line (and void elite). It has 3 direct upgrades that are very nice but the boss itself is very dangerous. If you want to grind it, I would recommend it after the 3 Tormented Synapses, Anglerfish, Elite Void & 3rd Zenyte (Tormented Bracelet)

sections.name: Bank 208
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear, Axe, Knife, 4x Willow Longbow, 5x Maple Logs, 4x Maple Longbow (u), Fishing Rod, Hammer

steps.task: Head West to the pub
Check Noticeboard (1) [Shadows of Custodia]
Talk to Marcus [Shadows of Custodia]
Talk to Bartender [Shadows of Custodia]
Head North-West
Talk to Ranulph [Vale Totems]
Complete Vale Totems

OPTIONAL: When training crafting you can build the 2 totems East & South-West of the bank and rebuild these for passivish Fletching Experience while bank standing Crafting. Fletch the unstrung bows on the way to them
Head North-East
Talk to Ictus [Shadows of Custodia]
Complete Shadows of Custodia]
Bank North-East

sections.name: Bank 209
sections.withdraw: Combat Gear (Melee & Range), Food & Potions, Teleport Runes

steps.task: Take North Quetzal to Teklan
Continue the Final Dawn until you unlock the Shortcut
Take the shortcut to the surface
Run East & activate statue
Run West & restock food & potions at the bank
Return to the shortcut & descend
Continue & Complete The Final Dawn

This unlocks Doom of Mokhaiotl which is accessible after you obtain all 3 Demonbane weapons down the line (and void elite). It has 3 direct upgrades that are very nice but the boss itself is very dangerous. If you want to grind it, I would recommend it after the 3 Tormented Synapses, Anglerfish, Elite Void & 3rd Zenyte (Tormented Bracelet)

sections.name: Bank 210
sections.withdraw: Adamant Pickaxe, Knife, Teak Log, 1Mil Coins, Camulet, 3x waterskin, Humidify Runes

steps.task: Calculate your crafting supplies required via molten glass to obtain 87/90/93 respectively (87 is for Zulrah, 90 Yama, 93 not too important)
Teleport to POH → Lunar Spellbook
Camulet to inside. Upgrade to infinite charges then camulet outside
Mine however many sand your calculations have shown
Superglass make all the Molten Glass with Giant Seaweed
Blow all the glass until whatever level you are after (I'd recommend 87 minimum for Zulrah or push 90 for Yama)

As mentioned earlier, you can blow this glass at Auburn & complete 2 totems nearby for passive fletching experience while bank standing & also unlocking the Vale Totem items passively. Use Maple Logs until you unlock Yew Logs from Zulrah

sections.name: Bank 211
sections.withdraw: Zenyte Shards, Chaos/Death Runes (29,000/14,500 per Onyx) [You may need to buy more], Karamja Gloves, Teleport Runes, Dramen Staff, House tab, Banana, Zombie Monkey Greegree, Chisel, Wily Cat

steps.task: Teleport to POH with the Tablet & change to Regular Spellbook
Fairy ring → BLP
Sell Chaos & Death Runes for Onyx's (260,000 tokkul per onyx)
Teleport to Ape Atoll
Infuse the Zenyte's and Onyx's together
Hunt Orange spices for +5 boosts as necessary and create your Zenyte Jewellry

Once you have a Ring of Suffering & Necklace of Anguish we can kill Zulrah fairly safely. However the food drops were nerfed so it may be worth grinding slightly better food as Zulrah can hit hard and you are close to a lot of more dangerous PvM. Anglerfish are very good for almost any and all instances of late game PvM but require 82 Fishing & 84 Cooking to obtain. I would recommend knocking this out to get it done at either Tempoross (Max XP method) or 3t Barbarian Fishing. If you afked Karambwans a lot you will probably have 70+ right now so barb fishing is very good. 82 Fishing is about a 20 hour grind. Anglerfish are good for Zulrah, Doom, Yama & ToB. Alternatively Zulrah is still accessible with Potatoes & Cheese with Karambwan combo eats as long as you are disciplined on teleports if you get spammed with range attacks.

Gear: (Make sure Suffering is imbued & recoil effect activated. Replace Inferno with Accumulator if you don't have (I preferred a bit extra range defence for tanz phases). Rune pouch with 'Cure Me' missing

As we have no good way to cure venom right now we will use the 'Cure Me' Lunar spell. Using this we want to camp only range (which is very effective) until we get a Serpentine Visage drop or we unlock Antivenoms.

When fighting Zulrah, the Green Phase & Red phase are straight forward, but the Tanz phase I would recommending eating whenever you lose health above what your food heals (if 18 health under max, eat a Karambwan, if hit a 40, double eat and be prepared for teleporting)
With this set up, Teleports should roughly self sustain. Outside of that, bank with Lunar Spell to Catherby and run from the Charter boat (Agility highly optional)

episodes.title: Episode 13 - Off Track with the guide as I went for avernic

steps.task: Excellent for many PvM encounters and you will use this to grind an Elder Maul over time. I would highly recommend the 2 alt red X method using a Bow of Faerdhinen for over 160 kills/hour. This does require 2 alts but they can then afk for 25 minutes once set up. They will need to be reset up if you get crashed or a clue hunter does their step. Wear a ring of wealth and you should get enough Crystal Keys from this grind to upgrade your Jewellry boxes to the max.
To be updated as I haven't done Doom yet on HCIM. Probably waves 1-7 then claim and repeat. Angler to 121 and flick rapid heal. Possibly very low supply boss.
